glsa.title: encfs: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in encfs, the worst of which can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Encfs is an implementation of encrypted filesystem in user-space using FUSE.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in encfs. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker can utilize a possible buffer overflow in the encodeName method of StreamNameIO and BlockNameIO to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service. Also multiple weak cryptographics practices have been found in encfs.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All encfs users should upgrade to the latest version:
